backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining door entry types (single, double, doubleSagwan, laminate coatings) with CRUD operations: addDoor, getAllTypes, getTotalSquareFeet (returns ComputeTotals with per-coating and grand totals), and deleteDoor; calculates square feet from rounded dimensions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the customer data reset functionality in App.tsx that clears name and mobile fields after quotation generation, coordinating with door entries clearing behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend files describing the door quotation app with fraction input support, grouped display by size, four coating types per door, customer info form, PDF/WhatsApp sharing, and theme toggle functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with wood-inspired warm palette for construction industry aesthetic.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title 'Door Measurement & Quotation App', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing customer info state (name, mobile), door entry form with reset ref, entry list, grand totals, and quotation actions; clears customer data and triggers form reset after quotation generation via handleQuotationGenerated callback.
frontend/src/components/CustomerInfoForm: Controlled form component with icon-enhanced inputs for customer name and mobile number, receiving values and change handlers as props for parent state management.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryForm.ts: Form component for adding door entries with fraction/decimal input support; exposes resetForm via imperative ref handle, rounds dimensions, and creates all 4 coating type entries per submission using useAddDoor mutation.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryList.ts: Displays a table of door entries grouped by size, showing coating costs (single, double, double+sagwan, laminate) per door size with delete functionality for each group.
frontend/src/components/GrandTotals.tsx: Shows grand total square feet and aggregated coating costs across all door entries, displaying only non-zero coating type totals.
frontend/src/components/QuotationActions: Provides buttons to generate a PDF quotation and share it via WhatsApp; clears all door entries after successful PDF generation.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout functionality and identity state management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching door entries, totals, and mutations for adding/deleting doors via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages theme state (light/dark) with localStorage persistence and system preference detection.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom wood-inspired color palettes for light and dark modes using CSS custom properties.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/coatingRates.ts: Exports constant rates per square foot for four coating types: single (185), double (220), double+sagwan (270), and laminate (450).
frontend/src/utils/dimensionRounding.ts: Provides functions to round door heights (72-84 inches) and widths (30-48 inches) to standard Indian carpenter sizes based on threshold rules.
frontend/src/utils/fractionParser.ts: Parses and validates door dimension inputs in decimal or fraction format (supporting eighths), and converts decimals to fraction display format.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates HTML-based quotation PDFs with customer info, grouped door entries by size, coating calculations, and formatted pricing using Indian currency formatting.
Calculates square feet from rounded door dimensions using the formula (height Ã— width) / 144.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Shares quotation PDFs via WhatsApp using Web Share API when available, with fallback to opening WhatsApp with a text message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended theme properties, animations, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests to clear customer name and mobile number fields after quotation generation, with pending implementation status.
